column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This place has been a staple for my wife and I. So tasteful
column2: full of magnificent works of art
column4: and treating its members well. If you're visiting
column5: you must stop by. You won't regret it! If you're a local
column6: become a member. You get complimentary coffee in the members seating area and get to bring a guest. What more could you ask for for around $100 a year??
